All three ratings categories are measured on a scale of 1 to 10, with 10 being the best. Less than 1 percent of parks or campgrounds receive the coveted 10 | 10 | 10 rating, which indicates superior facilities that are well maintained, clean, well-appointed restrooms and a highly appealing appearance. Campgrounds are inspected annually by dedicated RVers like you. Completeness of facilities 10 10 10 The first campground rating evaluates completeness and quality of facilities. In this category we rate interior roads, sites, registration area, hookups, recreation, swimming, security, laundry, store and building maintenance. Cleanliness of restrooms and showers 10 10 10 The second rating category concerns the cleanliness and physical characteristics of toilets, walls, showers, sinks/counters/mirrors and floor. If a park achieves a full point in each of the above, it receives a star ( ), indicating exceptionally clean restrooms. Also rated are physical characteristics of restrooms, including interior construction, adequate supplies/odor free, adequate number of facilities, exterior appearance and location in relation to park spaces, and interior appearance. Visual appeal and environmental quality 10 10 10 This category addresses the park's setting and site layout, function and identification of signage, overall exterior building maintenance, noise, trash disposal, litter and debris around the grounds and sites, and appearance of grounds, sites and entrance area. OUR STORY In 1992, Ashley and Katrin together with their 3 children started Water's Edge RV Park, Cascade, Idaho. What an adventure was ahead of us. Now, 26 years later, our daughter Kristin and her husband Matt are carrying on the tradition. At Water's Edge we are a family and we hope you will join us in making lasting memories. Saturday Morning Free Cinnamon Rolls Private BBQ Area & Fire Pit Bike Friendly Free Kayak Use “Three years ago I was in a car accident and went to Waters Edge to get away for a few days. Dining Dining Restaurants in Okeechobee Florida Near Water’s Edge RV Park in Central Florida Lightsey Fish Company & Seafood Restaurant If it hops, crawls or swims they probably serve it here. Menu offers a wide variety of locally caught seafood, from the Gulf, Atlantic Ocean and Lake Okeechobee.  Lots of choice including fried oysters, frog legs, grouper, catfish, shrimp, alligator and scallops. Atmosphere is family friendly. Los Cocos Mexican Restaurant This long time local favorite offers all the classic Mexican dishes you love including nachos, fajitas, and tostadas.  We recommend the wet burrito.  Everything is homemade and yummy including the tortillas and the best sweet tea in Okeechobee. Joey’s Supreme Pizza & Subs II Start with the garlic knots. They are huge, warm and fresh.   If you are careful not to fill up you’ll be happy when this pizza is delivered.  They serve up a great thin crust NY style pie. Zippy’s Zesty Wings They are famous for their buffalo wings, and recently expanded their menu to include Po’Boy’s, burgers and salads. Don’t miss the Cole Slaw. Ding A Ling Deli This deli offers quality Boar’s Head meats and cheeses, fresh bread and hand made sub rolls. Prices are good and portions are ample. Speckled Perch Don’t get fooled by the name.  This restaurant is all about the beef.  It’s hard to find so ask a local for directions. You’ll find anybody else who’s anybody in Okeechobee hanging in the dining room. The building and decor aren’t fancy in this hole in the wall place but the steaks are great and rib eye will be too big for your plate.  Be sure to start with the French onion soup. Pizza Heaven This local favorite has served the residents of Okeechobee pizza for over two decades.  People love it because it is good pizza. Landing Strip Cafe Good ole country cooking served fast.  A favorite with pilots you can watch planes take off from the dining room. Crossroads Restaurant It`s small, with lots of parking for large trucks and looks like a country diner should inside and out.  They don`t have a huge menu but what`s there is pretty good and you can`t beat the price. Lunkers Sports Grill Lunkers Sports Grille is the place to be if you’re into football. Pogey’s Family Restaurant Simple, affordable hometown favorite. Gladys’ Restaurant Perfect down home cheap breakfast spot when you are on a road trip. Pueblo Viejo This is one of the oldest restaurants in town. The service and the shrimp fajitas are awesome. Parrot Island Grill Known for their seafood but serve other American favorites as well. OK Corral Gun Club They are only open for lunch but have a varied lunch menu with daily specials. More info Home Welcome to Water’s Edge Motor-Coach & RV Resort Are you looking for the best  waterfront RV resort near Okeechobee FL where you can escape the crowds?  We invite you to experience the tranquility of Water’s Edge Motor-Coach & RV Resort in Okeechobee FL. Water’s Edge RV Resort is the perfect get away for a quiet and relaxing stay. We offer only 30 campsites and all of them are private and beautifully landscaped. We are located on the Rim Canal which is a deep and scenic channel that runs along the perimeter of Lake Okeechobee. Lake Okeechobee is Florida’s biggest lake and offers unique beauty, tropical foliage and diverse wildlife and some of the bass fishing in the country. Water’s Edge RV Resort is the perfect waterfront base for adventures like fresh water fishing, boating and hiking. It is also the perfect place to stay while exploring the Lake Okeechobee Scenic Trail. We’re located close to shopping and restaurants in the town of Okeechobee. Water’s Edge RV Park Okeechobee FL is close to the Seminole Casino, Orlando theme parks, Vero Beach Outlets and is only forty miles from the beautiful beaches on Florida’s east coast. For more information about the area check out the Lake Okeechobee page at Visit Florida. Water’s Edge RV Park Okeechobee FL amenities include an outdoor pool, boat ramp, Chickee Hut and a clubhouse.
